title: Fix opaque surfaces for TaskCard and task modals (light/dark)

requirements.summary: Ensure TaskCard always renders with an opaque (non-transparent) card surface in light and dark themes, including hover/focus states.
acceptanceCriteria: In light theme, each task card has an opaque background (no page content visible through the card).
In dark theme, each task card has an opaque background (no page content visible through the card).
Hover/focus styles still work and do not reintroduce transparency.

requirements.summary: Make all task-related modal dialog surfaces (Create, Edit, Delete confirmation) render with an opaque background in light and dark themes everywhere they are used.
acceptanceCriteria: Create Task dialog content is opaque (no underlying UI visible through the modal surface).
Edit Task dialog content is opaque (no underlying UI visible through the modal surface).
Delete Task confirmation dialog content is opaque (no underlying UI visible through the modal surface).
The fix applies consistently anywhere these dialogs are opened in the app.
Modal readability is maintained in both light and dark themes (text remains legible against the new solid background).
